statements: UPDATE customers SET total_spent = total_spent + 100 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET customer_age = 30, customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET total_spent = total_spent + 100.50, customer_age = customer_age + 1 WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', total_spent = total_spent * 1.1 WHERE customer_id = 102
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 1000.50, quantity = 5 WHERE order_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, customer_name = 'Alice' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 1000.50, quantity = 5 WHERE customer_id = 2 AND order_date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='Alice', customer_age=30 WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE purchases SET purchase_amount=100.50 WHERE purchase_id=2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET purchase_amount = 150.75, purchase_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE purchase_id = 3;
